content: PC servers are down in all regions. We are investigating the cause. We greatly appreciate your patience and apologize for the inconvenience.
Waiting for PUBG to come back online!,pic.twitter.com/PI3umYh3S4
Bro... Dont do me like that
This has happened with every new title that has sold anywhere near 10 million copies since the dawn of multiplayer games.
We know Chris, don't worry, we're just teasing them. It's not like they're 4 years late... *cough cough*... DayZ...
describe the pubg launch in one picture,pic.twitter.com/K4mt6pYb2O
Now they are buying likes wtf

They don't need to buy them. They are bots that automatically like it to trick people into thinking it's legit. They are all over the place. Don't ever put your info in and report it any chance you get.
Yeah, so someone buys the bot to like the post. exactly what he said...
They completely ignored both his messages and I am so confused.

You don't have to "buy" bots when they are the ones with the bots. I didn't reply because I've been in arguments with people like that before. It never gets solved. They have thousands of accounts with slightly different tags.
Full release this shouldn’t happen, shocking
Right so you’re telling me they also couldn’t predict that? And they can’t prevent it.

PUBG is still in early access in all regions. We greatly appreciate your patience and need to inform you that we are going to place the game back into Early Access. As you can tell it is clearly ready for full release and the two more hours of maintenance helped a lot...
